content.prompt: The reaction is catalyzed by solid nickel. Which of the following describes the effect of the catalyst on the reaction?

choices.label: The presence of the catalyst results in an overall reaction that releases less energy.
The presence of the catalyst results in a reaction pathway that requires a lower activation energy.
The presence of the catalyst results in an overall reaction that requires more energy.
The presence of the catalyst results in a reaction pathway that requires a greater activation energy.

skill.text: 4.A: Predict and/or explain chemical properties or phenomena (e.g., of atoms or molecules) using given chemical theories, models, and representations.
